description: This file contains functions related to reasoning with OpenAI models, including model identification and message processing for reasoning tasks within an AI system.

methods.name: is_openai_reasoning_model
methods.description: Determines if a given reasoning model is an OpenAI or Azure OpenAI model based on its class name and ID.

methods.name: get_openai_reasoning
methods.description: Executes reasoning with an agent and processes the response to extract reasoning content, returning a Message object.

methods.name: aget_openai_reasoning
methods.description: Asynchronous version of get_openai_reasoning, updating message roles and handling async agent responses.
